Common¶

Common ML operations to be used by all algorithms in POM2.

class MMLL.models.POM2.CommonML.POM2_CommonML.POM2_CommonML_Master(comms, logger, verbose=False)¶

Bases: MMLL.models.Common_to_POMs_123.Common_to_POMs_123_Master

This class implements the Common ML operations, run at Master node. It inherits from Common_to_POMs_123_Master.

Create a POM2_CommonML_Master instance.

Parameters

  • comms (Comms_master) – Object providing communications functionalities.

  • logger (mylogging.Logger) – Logging object instance.

  • verbose (boolean) – Indicates whether to print messages on screen nor not.

encrypt_list(unencrypted_list)¶

Function to encrypt a list of arrays.

Parameters

unencrypted_list (list of arrays) – List to encrypt.

Returns

encrypted_list – Encrypted list.

Return type

list of arrays

reset()¶

Create/reset some variables needed by the Master Node.

Parameters

None –

class MMLL.models.POM2.CommonML.POM2_CommonML.POM2_CommonML_Worker(master_address, comms, logger, verbose=False)¶

Bases: MMLL.models.Common_to_POMs_123.Common_to_POMs_123_Worker

Class implementing the POM2 Common operations, run at Worker node. It inherits from Common_to_POMs_123_Worker.

Create a POM2_CommonML_Worker instance.

Parameters

  • master_address (string) – Identifier of the master instance.

  • comms (Comms_worker) – Object providing communication functionalities.

  • logger (mylogging.Logger) – Logging object instance.

  • verbose (boolean) – Indicates whether to print messages on screen nor not.

ProcessPreprocessingPacket(packet)¶

Process the received packet at worker.

Parameters

packet (dictionary) – Packet received from master.

decrypt_array(encrypted_list)¶

Function to decrypt an array.

Parameters

encrypted_array (array) – Encrypted array.

Returns

unencrypted_array – Decrypted array.

Return type

array

decrypt_list(encrypted_list)¶

Function to decrypt a list.

Parameters

encrypted_list (list of arrays) – List to decrypt.

Returns

unencrypted_list – Decrypted list.

Return type

list of arrays

encrypt_list(unencrypted_list)¶

Function to encrypt a list.

Parameters

unencrypted_list (list of arrays) – List with values to encrypt.

Returns

encrypted_list – Encrypted list.

Return type

list of arrays

generate_keypair()¶

Function to generate fixed public/private keys. All workers must have the same keys in this POM.

Parameters

None –

Returns

  • public_key (paillier.PaillierPublicKey) – Public key of the worker.

  • private_key (phe.paillier.PaillierPrivateKey) – Private key of the worker.
